td.content: s:patient presents with Liver for 3 weeks. she has a history of Cirrhosis for past 5 years. patient is a F retired aged 79 yrs. she denies ever using cigarettes patient has a history of excessive levels of alcohol consumption o:Height 67 in, Weight 207 lbs, Temperature 98.2 F, Pulse 86, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16, US Liver shows evidence of ascites, hepatic nodularity, increased hepatic echogenicity a:Cirrhosis p:administered Azathioprine - 3 mg/kg daily, performed US Liver, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

td.content: s:patient presents with 7 months history of Liver. she is a F aged 79 yrs. o:Height 66 in, Weight 200 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 80, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 13 a:Cirrhosis p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and prescribed Interferon alfa 2-b - 3 MU subcutaneously 3 x week for up to 24 months, and ordered CBC, Liver Function Panel.
